00022 #include "ChromosomeTable.h"
00023 
00024 map<string, int64_t> ChromosomeTable::m_shortNameToKey; 
00025 
00026 ChromosomeTable::ChromosomeTable(sqlite3* AnnotationDb)
00027 {
00028     m_annotationDb = AnnotationDb;
00029 }
00030 
00031 int ChromosomeTable::ReadTableCallback(void *NotUsed, int argc, char **argv, char **azColName)
00032 {   
00033 
00034     string shortName = argv[0];
00035     int64_t key;
00036     std::stringstream iss(argv[1]);
00037     if ((iss >> key).fail())
00038     {
00039         std::stringstream message;
00040         message << "Error loading Chromosome table. Key '" << argv[1] << "' cannot be converted to integer.";
00041         throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00042     }
00043     
00044     map<string, int64_t>::iterator shortNameToKeyIterator = m_shortNameToKey.find(shortName);
00045     if (shortNameToKeyIterator == m_shortNameToKey.end())
00046     {                      
00047         m_shortNameToKey.insert(std::make_pair(shortName,key));    
00048     }
00049     else
00050     {
00051         m_shortNameToKey[shortName] = key;
00052     }
00053 
00054     return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 
00059 void ChromosomeTable::Load()
00060 {
00061     
00062     char *errorMessage = NULL;
00063     
00064     m_shortNameToKey.clear();
00065     m_shortNameToKey.insert(std::make_pair("---", 2147483648)); // "---" in CSV files for Chromosome column represents not a number
00066     m_shortNameToKey.insert(std::make_pair("2147483648", 2147483648));
00067     m_shortNameToKey.insert(std::make_pair("DBNULL", 2147483648));
00068     m_shortNameToKey.insert(std::make_pair("NA", 2147483648));
00069     
00070     
00071       if(sqlite3_exec(m_annotationDb, "Select shortname, key from Chromosome", ChromosomeTable::ReadTableCallback, 0, &errorMessage) != SQLITE_OK)
00072       {
00073         std::string message = "Cannot read data from the Chromosome table! ";
00074         if (errorMessage != NULL)
00075         {
00076             message += errorMessage;
00077             delete(errorMessage);
00078         }
00079         throw Except(message.c_str());
00080       }   
00081     
00082 }
00083 int64_t ChromosomeTable::GetKey(string ShortName)
00084 {
00085     map<string, int64_t>::iterator shortNameToKeyIterator = m_shortNameToKey.find(ShortName);
00086     if (shortNameToKeyIterator != m_shortNameToKey.end())
00087     {
00088         return shortNameToKeyIterator->second;
00089     }
00090     else
00091     {   
00092         if (ShortName == "M") 
00093         {// CSVTOSQLITE-344 Error occurs for "M" value conversion for Chromosome.
00094             return GetKey("MT");
00095         }
00096         std::string message = "Could not find a key for the Short Name '" + ShortName + "' in the Chromosome Table";
00097         throw Except(message.c_str());
00098     }    
00099 }
